response.overview: His photographs take you around the world, but this compelling and educational program brings you into the home of Peter Menzel and his wife, writer Faith D'Aluisio, for an insightful interview about their work on Man Eating Bugs, Material World, What the World Eats, and What I Eat. In additional stand-alone segments, the pair offers their informed perspectives on nutrition, sustainability, globalization, and journalism. Also included is rare video footage -- of a younger Manzel critiquing his fresh tarantula as too well-done, for example -- stunning photographs, statistics, maps, quotations from experts, and graphs for teaching grades 6 and up. Color.  30 minutes. Social Studies School Service 2011.
response.tagline: The Work of Peter Menzel and Faith D'Aluisio
response.title: Around the World in Photographs
